Uses of Tile in thelastpromise
 

Subclasses of Tile in thelastpromise
 class ForestTile
          This class is used to draw the ForestTile in the location being given, and to return the name of the ForestTiles sound file so it can be played
 class GoldMine
           
 class GrassTile
          This class is used to draw grass tiles in specific locations and return the sound they will make if they are walked across.
 class WaterTile
          This class extend the Tile and loc is recieved/returned and the image does the same.
